events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under Engineering for the role of backend software developer.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will reach out to you soon to discuss next steps.
The initial screening call went well; you demonstrated strong knowledge of software development concepts.
Thank you for the opportunity. I am excited to move forward and look forward to the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th at 3 PM UTC with our senior developer team.
The technical interview concluded successfully; you solved the coding challenges efficiently and demonstrated problem-solving skills.
The HR interview has been scheduled for April 13th at 10 AM UTC to discuss your cultural fit and benefits.
Your HR interview went very well; we appreciated your openness and alignment with company values.
We are pleased to extend a formal offer for the software engineer position, including details on salary and benefits.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the details and am enthusiastic about joining your engineering team.
I am pleased to accept the offer and excited to contribute as a software developer to the team.
Your onboarding process has begun with access to necessary tools and an introduction to our development workflows.
The hiring process is now complete. Welcome aboard as our newest software engineer on the development team.
